data.title: Tyree Funeral Home
data.meta_description: Obituaries and announcements from Tyree Funeral Home, as published in The Register Herald
data.text:
Herman Hunter Williams Sr. Obituary

Herman Hunter Williams Sr., 80 of Clear Creek, passed away Tuesday, March 3, 2020 at Raleigh General Hospital.

In keeping with Herman's wishes he will be cremated. A memorial service will be 2:00 PM Saturday, March 7, 2020 at the Clear Creek Presbyterian Church. Friends may call two hours prior to the service

Online condolences may be sent at...

John L. Kinder Obituary

John L. Kinder, age 94, of Lewisburg, WV, formerly of Oak Hill, WV, died March 2, 2020, at the Seasons Place assisted living in Lewisburg.

Born in Nellis, WV on May 29, 1925, he was the son of the late Harvey and Gracie Mae Kinder.

He was preceded in death by three brothers, Ed Kinder, Dennis Kinder, and Ray Kinder; and four sisters, Hester Chapman, Elsie...

Richard L. Martin Sr. Obituary

Oak Hill resident Richard L. Martin Sr., 79, passed away peacefully Tuesday, February 18th, 2020, at the Bowers Hospice House comforted by family.

Services will be held on Friday, February 21, 2020, at Tyree Funeral Home with visitation 11:30 am to 1:00 pm, service at 1:00pm and burial immediately following at High Lawn Memorial Park, Oak Hill, WV.

Mr. Martin...

Wanda Elizabeth Cafego Meador Obituary

Wanda Elizabeth Cafego Meador, 85, of Oak Hill, passed away peacefully on Monday, February 10, 2020 at Bowers Hospice House.

Born on October 22, 1934, in McDunn, WV, she was the daughter of the late Frank and Esther Cafego. In addition to her parents, she is predeceased by her husband, Bill, brother, John Cafego, her sister, Anna Lalli and her niece, Kyra Ann...

Curtis Dale 'Corky' Pittman Obituary

Curtis Dale "Corky" Pittman, 63, of Oak Hill, passed away at his residence on Monday, January 27, 2020 after a long battle with cancer

Born January 29, 1956 in Oak Hill, he was the son of the late William D. and Grace Alene Waugh Pittman.

"Corky" was a dispatcher for US Wells, and was former owner of Process Construction inc. of Oak Hill, was a member of the...

Sandra Kay Baker Simmons Obituary

Sandra Kay Baker Simmons, 70, of Oak Hill, lost her 3 year battle with renal disease on Sunday, January 12, 2020.

Born August 28, 1949, in West Virginia, she was the only child of the late Duffy and Eloise Rock Baker of Oak Hill.

She moved to Philadelphia, PA as a young girl where she learned to cook authentic Italian food by watching "Papa Tag" at his...

Phyllis Evans Surbaugh Obituary

Phyllis Evans Surbaugh, 85, of Oak Hill passed away on Saturday, January 11, 2020.

Funeral service will be 1:00 PM Tuesday, January 14, 2020, at Tyree Funeral Home in Oak Hill with Dr. Ken Krimmel officiating. Burial will follow at High Lawn Memorial Park. Visitation for friends will be two hours prior to service.

Debra Sue Craddock Obituary

Debra Sue Craddock, 62, of Mount Hope, died on Tuesday, December 31, 2019, at Bowers Hospice House in Beckley.

Born May 14, 1957, in Heidelberg, Germany, she was the daughter of Connie Jo Duncan Craddock and the late Everette L. Craddock.

She was a home healthcare worker.

Her husband, Tim Hutchenson; sister, Loretta Devine; and brother, Clifford Craddock...

Patrick Sean Conner Obituary

Oak Hill

Patrick Sean Conner,25, of Oak Hill passed away Monday December 23, 2019 after a short illness. Son of Norman Keith Conner of Oak Hill, West Virginia and Patricia Darlene Aranda-Conner of Cleveland, Ohio, he was born April 25, 1994 in Oak Hill. Patrick was a member of Our Ladies of the Angels Catholic Church.

He is survived by daughters, Ava Conner of...

Virginia Lee Sprouse Plasha Obituary

Virginia Lee Sprouse Plasha of Oak Hill died on December 18, 2019, following a short illness.

She was born June 20, 1926, in Kingston, WV.

Her husband, Henry "Hank" Plasha, preceded her in death.

Surviving is daughter, Susan Plasha Peart of Kennesaw, GA.

Visitation will be on Monday, December 23, 2019, at Tyree Funeral Home, Oak Hill, from 12:00 noon with...

Berkley Wayne Scarbro Obituary

Berkley Wayne Scarbro, 79, of Oak Hill, WV passed away Monday, December 16, 2019, at Plateau Medical Center.

Born July 24, 1940, in Lochgelly, WV he was the son of the late Layton and Vivian Brooks Scarbro.

Berkley was a member of UMWA local 1330 having worked as an underground miner. He attended the Jones Avenue First Church of God for 42 years, for the last...

Barbara Joyce Stinnett Huddleston Obituary

A dedicated wife, mother and grandmother, Barbara Joyce Stinnett Huddleston, 91, of Oak Hill, WV, went to be with her Lord and Savior on Friday, December 13, 2019 at Bowers Hospice House in Beckley, WV.

Born April 26, 1928 at Prudence, WV she was the daughter of the late Clifford Robert and Mary Lenora Shepherd Stinnett.

Barbara was salutatorian for the Oak...

Mack Edward Coffman Obituary

Mack Edward Coffman, age 68, of Hilltop, passed away at Ruby Memorial Hospital, Morgantown, on Thursday, December 12, 2019.

Born November 4, 1951, at Sun, WV, he was the son the late Mack Shirley and Carrie Elizabeth Williams Coffman.

Mack was of the Baptist faith, was a pipe fitter in the natural gas industry.

He was preceded in death by his wife Vivian...

Trela Kay Akers Obituary

Trela Kay Akers, 71, went to be with her beloved husband Roger Lee Akers on Tuesday morning December 10, 2019 after a short illness.

Preceded in death by her parents, Ray "Stabe" and Mary Elizabeth (Feazelle) Evans; sister, Susan Elizabeth Evans; and nephew, Johnathon Tyler Ray Moore.

Leaving behind her family of daughter, Susan Elizabeth Akers of Maynor; son,...

Teressa Ann Gibson Obituary

Teressa Ann Gibson, 66, of Fayetteville, WV passed away Monday, December 2, 2019, at Plateau Medical Center, Oak Hill, WV.

Born May 6, 1953, in Cripple Creek, VA, she was the daughter of the late Emery Ray and Donna May Kelly Scarbro.

Teressa worked for more than 30 years at Walmart. She loved spending time with her family and also her Walmart family.

She is...

Raymond H. Lokant Obituary

Raymond H. Lokant, 89, of Oak Hill, WV went peacefully to his Heavenly Father on Monday, December 2, 2019.

Born June 25, 1930, in Minden, WV he was the son of the late Carl Hugo Lokant, Sr. and Mary Gilkey Lokant.

Raymond was a veteran of the US Army having served during the Korean Conflict. He was a devoted employee of Cabot Gas for 40 years and was a member...

Raymond H. Lokant Obituary

Raymond H. Lokant, 89, of Oak Hill, died on Monday, December 2, 2019 at Raleigh General Hospital in Beckley.

Arrangements are pending.

Online condolences may be sent at www.tyreefuneralhome.com

John A. Davis Obituary

On the afternoon of November 20, 2019; distant clouds covering the blue sky and West Virginia mountain tops, parted way as John A. Davis, 92, was welcomed into the arms of his Heavenly father.

He was preceded in death by his loving wife of over 60 years, Doris June Worlledge Davis. He is survived by his four children, John Steven Davis (Debbie), Dorma Ball...

Twila Joan Payne Coleman Obituary

Our loving and devoted mother and Grammy, Twila Joan Payne Coleman, 76, of Dothan, WV, died on Friday, November 22, 2019, at Ruby Memorial Hospital in Morgantown, WV.

Born December 19, 1942, at Dothan, WV, she was the daughter of the late Charles Redon "Jake" and Betty Ruth Painter Payne.

A 1960 graduate of Collins High School in Oak Hill, Joan went on to...

Twila Joan Payne Coleman Obituary

Our loving and devoted mother and Grammy, Twila Joan Payne Coleman, 76, of Dothan, WV, died on Friday, November 22, 2019, at Ruby Memorial Hospital in Morgantown.

Nancy Lee Perry Johnson James Obituary

Nancy Lee Perry Johnson James, 80, of Oak Hill, WV, passed away on November 17, 2019.

Nancy was born on September 15, 1939, in Sun, WV, to the late Rev. Cecil H. Perry and Virginia Bryant Perry.

After graduating from Mount Hope High School in 1957, Nancy graduated from Morris Harvey College in 1964 with a degree in elementary education and furthered her...

Thomas Ballard Thorne (Tommy) Obituary

Thomas Ballard Thorne (Tommy), 66 of Price Hill departed this world peacefully at home on November 15, 2019. Thomas was 11-generation direct descendant of the renowned William Thorne signer of the Flushing Remonstrance in the year of our Lord 1657. The Flushing Remonstrance is regarded as the precursor to the U.S. Constitution provision on freedom of religion...

Anita Karen Williams Evans Obituary

Anita Karen Williams Evans, age 70, of Mount Hope, WV, passed away on Thursday, November 14, 2019, at Raleigh General Hospital in Beckley.

Born April 6, 1949, in Fayette Co., she was the daughter of Dora I Shupe Williams and the late Shirley E. Williams.

Karen was a homemaker and was employed as a clerk at Pettry's Store in Pax until its closing. She was a...
